snippet.title: VR Giants is coming to Kickstarter
snippet.description:
VR Giants is a local coop VR game in which one VR player and one gamepad player work together. The VR player controls a giant and must protect and support the dwarf who is controlled by the gamepad player. The dwarf can use the body of the giant as an extension of the level.

Created by Wolfgang Tschauko
